data.title: PETER CRONE
data.meta_description:
Mind Architect Peter Crone is a thought leader in human potential and 
performance. He devotes his life to sharing insights and strategies to 
create an inspired life and find true freedom by awakening new levels of 
awareness.
data.text:
Find Spiritual Freedom, Mental Peace, & Physical Vitality

I am here to help humanity reach its greatest potential.

I specialize in revealing the limiting beliefs and subconscious narratives that dictate and shape behavior, health, relationships, and performance.

MEET PETER CRONE, THE MIND ARCHITECT

Ready to make your mark on the world?

THE FREEDOM MEMBERSHIP

Peter has helped some of the most talented people in the world unlock even greater potential –

here's what they're saying...

Homepage Testimonials

– Charles Howell III, PGA Champion

– Charlie Buckingham, Olympic Sailor, USA

– Jim Nantz, CBS

– I.K. Kim, LPGA Champion

– Miguel Montero, Chicago Cubs, World Series Winner

– Paul Goldschmidt, Arizona Diamondbacks, All-Star

– Kristen Jackman, Twitter

Explore All Workshops

DIVE INTO A NEW WAY OF LIVING

From individuals to athletes, corporations, and beyond Peter helps transform mindset to align it with higher purpose.

"I highly recommend that all companies who want to bring mindfulness and mental fitness into their companies leverage Peter as an advisor and facilitator for their leaders and teams."

— Kristen Jackman, Twitter

COACHING

Work with Peter Crone and unlock your unlimited potential.

SPEAKING

Inspire your leaders and improve their performance.

Change your mind, change your life.

THE FREE YOUR MIND COURSE
